application: End-to-end test implementation for a SaaS platform
description: This thesis explores the role of automated testing frameworks, particularly End-to-end (E2E) testing, in the context of Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platforms. It delves into the significance of automated testing in ensuring the quality and scalability of modern software, especially in the era of cloud services. The theoretical part covers the fundamentals of software production, testing methodologies, and the importance of automated testing pipelines. It also discusses various testing frameworks with a focus on E2E testing. The practical aspect of the thesis involves the implementation of an E2E test protocol for a SaaS platform, specifically developed for Mindhive Oy. This includes the development of testing protocols, a semi-automated pipeline, and user documentation. The thesis concludes with a detailed analysis of the implemented tests, pipeline, and suggestions for future improvements and generalizations of the developed methods to other E2E test frameworks.
